txt.en:
After encountering and defeating the elusive aurochs, Tarangarn, you have claimed a trophy that may be of value to the Dúnedain of Cardolan.

As you inspect Tarangarn's horns, you take note of their startlingly-intact points, especially coming from an aurochs of Tarangarn's age. It is rumoured that certain folk in the North have been said to wear them as a sort of armour, but you can hardly imagine bearing such a burden upon your shoulders.

You should bring this trophy to Gaerion, a trophy-hunter and lore-keeper of the Dúnedain of Cardolan.
Deliver Tarangarn's horns to Gaerion in Cardolan

Gaerion can be found at Sírlond in Cardolan.\n\nYou have acquired a trophy from an elusive foe in Cardolan. You should deliver it to Gaerion, a trophy-hunter and lore-keeper of the Dúnedain of Cardolan.
After encountering the elusive aurochs, Tarangarn, you have claimed a trophy that may be of value to the Dúnedain of Cardolan.

'Hail, traveller. What do you have there?'

Gaerion inspects Tarangarn's horns closely, studying various markings and wear upon them.

'This is a fascinating find, friend. If you would be willing to part with it, I can offer you my gratitude... and some coin, of course.

'I shall see that it is well-preserved among our keepings—and that is a promise. You have my thanks!'
